name: Rio and Karo's Super Tasty Three Course Sunday Brunch
name_original: Rio and Karo's Super Tasty Three Course Sunday Brunch
description:
Rio and Karo's Super Tasty Three Course Sunday Brunch

Collection of three short games created in the month of March, 2015 for an art exhibition

Each game was made hastily and sweatily, hours before the deadline

Choose between:
Munch Munch ® - a classic grow-n-shrinker
Black Ant ® - a never ending shoe stomper
and
Last Words ® - a game that might make you rethink your previous life choices

Arrow keys and ENTER to select a game

Press SHIFT at any time to return to the main menu
